references: C. Stanley Ogilvy and John T. Anderson, Excursions in Number Theory, Oxford University Press, NY, 1966, pp. 90-92.
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
prog: (PARI) { for (n=0, 1000, write("b060300.txt", n, " ", (2*n*(n + 1))^2); ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 03 2009]
author: Jason Earls (zevi_35711(AT)yahoo.com), Mar 25 2001
extensions: Corrected the definition from 2n(n+1)^2 to (2n(n+1))^2. - _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 03 2009
